settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your application preferences and manage your account
settings.userPreferencesDescription: Customize your language, liturgical preferences, and default settings.

events.title: Parish Events
events.description: Configure event types for parish activities like Bible Study, Fundraisers, and Religious Education.

settings.eventTypesDescription: Define custom event categories for parish activities. Each event type becomes a template with its own fields and settings.
settings.customListsDescription: Manage custom lists for event field options like songs, readings, or locations.
settings.petitionSettingsDescription: Configure default petition templates for different liturgical occasions.
settings.parishSettingsDescription: Manage your current parish information and administrative settings.
settings.contentLibraryDescription: Manage reusable liturgical content like readings, prayers, and ceremony text.
settings.categoryTagsDescription: Manage tags for organizing and categorizing content and petitions (Admin only).
settings.eventTemplatesDescription: View and manage saved event templates. Templates store commonly used field values for quick event creation.
settings.searchTemplates: Search templates by name or description...
settings.noTemplatesCreated: No templates have been created yet. Templates are saved from individual events.
settings.deleteTemplateConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
settings.errorLoadingSettings: There was an error loading your settings. Please try again later.

eventTypes.title: Event Types
eventTypes.explanation: Event Types define the categories of events your parish can schedule. Create types for sacraments (Weddings, Baptisms, Funerals), parish activities (Bible Study, Youth Group), or any recurring event your parish needs.
eventTypes.examples: Examples: Wedding, Baptism, Funeral, Parish Meeting, Bible Study, Youth Group, RCIA Session
eventTypes.howItWorks: When you create an Event Type, you're creating a template. You can then add custom fields, configure settings, and create printable scripts. Every event created with this type will inherit these settings.
eventTypes.dragToReorder: Drag to reorder how event types appear in menus.
eventTypes.noEventTypesMessage: Create an event type to start scheduling parish events. Event types define categories like "Wedding", "Funeral", "Bible Study", or any other recurring event your parish needs.
eventTypes.createDescription: Create a new event category for your parish
eventTypes.createExplanation: You're creating a new event category. After creation, you can add custom fields (like "Topic" or "Room Number") and configure scripts for printing.
eventTypes.namePlaceholder: e.g., Parish Meeting, Bible Study, Youth Group
eventTypes.nameHelp: Choose a clear, descriptive name. This will appear in dropdown menus when staff create new events.
eventTypes.iconHelp: Choose an icon to help visually identify this event type in lists and calendars.

specialLiturgies.title: Special Liturgies
specialLiturgies.explanation: Special Liturgies are non-sacramental liturgical celebrations like Benediction, Stations of the Cross, or Holy Hours. Create types for each special liturgy your parish celebrates.
specialLiturgies.examples: Examples: Benediction, Stations of the Cross, Holy Hour, Adoration, Liturgy of the Hours
specialLiturgies.noSpecialLiturgiesMessage: Create a special liturgy type to start scheduling these celebrations. Special liturgies are non-sacramental liturgical celebrations.
specialLiturgies.createDescription: Create a new special liturgy type
specialLiturgies.createExplanation: You're creating a new special liturgy type. After creation, you can add custom fields and configure scripts for printing.
specialLiturgies.namePlaceholder: e.g., Benediction, Stations of the Cross, Holy Hour
specialLiturgies.nameHelp: Choose a clear, descriptive name for this special liturgy type.
specialLiturgies.iconHelp: Choose an icon to help visually identify this special liturgy type.

sacraments.title: Sacraments
sacraments.explanation: Sacraments are sacred signs and mysteries instituted by Christ. Create types for each sacrament your parish celebrates.
sacraments.examples: Examples: Baptism, Confirmation, Wedding, Reconciliation, Anointing of the Sick, First Communion, Quinceanera
sacraments.noSacramentsMessage: Create a sacrament type to start scheduling these celebrations. Sacraments are sacred signs instituted by Christ.
sacraments.createExplanation: You're creating a new sacrament type. After creation, you can add custom fields and configure scripts for printing.
sacraments.nameHelp: Choose a clear, descriptive name for this sacrament type.
sacraments.iconHelp: Choose an icon to help visually identify this sacrament type.
